FileSystemTree_collapseFolder.name: FileSystemTree_collapseFolder
FileSystemTree_collapseFolder.description: Collapses a folder in the FileSystemTree view to reduce LLM token usage. Any collapsed child folders are removed from the collapsed list.

parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.description: The folder to collapse in the File System tree view

FileSystemTree_collapseFolder.returns: If the node was collapsed, i.e. the folderPath exists and is a folder

FileSystemTree_expandAll.name: FileSystemTree_expandAll
FileSystemTree_expandAll.description: Expands all directories in the file system tree view

FileSystemTree_expandFolder.name: FileSystemTree_expandFolder
FileSystemTree_expandFolder.description: Expands a folder in the FileSystemTree view when needing to view a relevant part of the file system

parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.description: The folder to expand in the File System tree view. If no value is provided, then all folders are expanded and always returns true.

FileSystemTree_expandFolder.returns: If the node was expanded, i.e. the folderPath exists and is a folder and was previously collapsed
